## OmniAPI Project Instructions

This is the OmniAPI Go project workspace. When working with this project:

- Use Go best practices and conventions
- Follow standard Go project structure
- Use proper error handling patterns
- Write idiomatic Go code
- Include proper documentation and comments
- Use go modules for dependency management
- Follow naming conventions (camelCase for local variables, PascalCase for exported)
- Include unit tests where appropriate

## Project Structure

- `main.go` - Entry point of the application
- `go.mod` - Go module definition
- `go.sum` - Dependency checksums
- Additional packages should be organized in subdirectories
